tweet: This has been a great week. AKITA is setting up the M2M Ecosystem Showcase Team, Hardware and Infrastructure. A big thank you to the community and IOTA EDF. A large application area of #IOTA will be the #SmartCities in the future. An incredible number of connected devices will process the data, analyze it and make payments. There is a lot happening here right now. Also read our medium article  https://t.co/QPCPnZD0y9

Audi Think Tank & #IOTA Foundation explore Tangle-based #mobility use cases - "The last five months we had a great time at the #AudiDenkwerkstatt Berlin, working in crossfunctional teams with IOTA on a new project." #Audi  https://t.co/YgmFAaRFkM
